db:info.db:title: Enginio QML Examples - Social Todos
db:info.db:titleabbrev: Client library for Enginio from QML

db:abstract.db:para: Social Todos is a todo list application with a social twist, demonstrating the user management and access control features of Enginio.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
DEFINES += ENGINIO_SAMPLE_NAME=\\\"socialtodos\\\"
include(../../common/backendhelper/qmlbackendhelper.pri)
QT += quick qml enginio SOURCES += ../main.cpp
mac: CONFIG -= app_bundle
OTHER_FILES += \ Header.qml \ List.qml \ Login.qml \ ShareDialog.qml \ TextField.qml \ TodoLists.qml \ socialtodos.qml
RESOURCES += socialtodos.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/enginio/quick/socialtodos INSTALLS += target
EXAMPLE_FILES += \ backendconfig
